scripts.generate: PACKAGE_VERSION='4.11.0' yarn openapi-generator-cli generate --generator-key client && ln -fs "$(pwd)/complement" "$(pwd)/output/" && yarn lint && yarn install
scripts.build:spec: yarn swagger-cli bundle openapi_spec/spec.yml --outfile dist/openapi.yml --type yaml
scripts.client:build: cd output/ && yarn install && yarn build && cd ..
